summary: More thralls in Skyrim! If you ever thought that the thralls in Skyrim weren't enough and could use improvement, then this is the mod for you. This mod adds 7 new thralls to the game, adds a special merchant to sell the spell tomes for them, and allows Dead Thrall to work on more than just humans.
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to improve the dull variety of the master conjuration spells in Skyrim.

[size=15][COLOR=#FF0000]Features[/COLOR][/size]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
[LIST][*]Dremora Lord Thrall (Daedric Thrall)
[*]Familiar Thrall
[*]Ash Spawn Thrall (Ash Thrall)
[*]Boneman Thrall
[*]Mistman Thrall
[*]Wrathman Thrall
[*]Seeker Thrall
[*]A spell tome for each new thrall spell
[*]A custom merchant to sell the spell tomes
[*]Allows Dead Thrall to reanimate not just humans, but also undead and creatures[/LIST]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
The merchant likes to hang out near the trapdoor into the Midden in the college courtyard. He is a very tall, daedric armor wearing khajiit, so he's pretty hard to miss.

[size=15][COLOR=#FF0000]Requirements:[/COLOR][/size]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
[LIST][*]Dawnguard DLC
[*]Dragonborn DLC[/LIST]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Soon to come: Possibly a thrall that can be used like a regular follower and use of the stronger thralls perk for the added thralls.

Well, that's all. Have fun!
author: ASchoe311

files.name: Enhanced Thralls Mod
files.changelogHtml: Changed Dead Thrall spell to work on humans, undead, and creatures instead of just humans.

files.name: Enhanced Thralls Mod
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed spell casting animations
Added in a placeholder for a future thrall that can carry items for the player
